https://tmrev.io/movie/334875-Ek Paheli Leela 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7hay3a60XpLeb18kFC7o6G1W1lQ.jpg It is a reincarnation story about the love between Leela and her lover, which is left incomplete because one of them has been murdered. The story comes to circle after 300 long years; when Leela has taken birth as Meera and her lover's character is also reborn. Ek Paheli Leela
